1. Aplastic anemia
2. Refractory cytopenia with unilineage dysplasia
3. Refractory anemia with excess blasts
4. Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
5. Fanconi anemia
6. Diamond-Blackfan anemia
7. Dyskeratosis congenita
8. Shwachman-Diamond syndrome
